doc:
Melissa Ponzio https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Melissa_Ponzio 0 Melissa Ponzio (born August 3, 1972) is an American actress, best known for her roles as Melissa McCall on Teen Wolf and Karen on The Walking Dead. Most recently, Ponzio has starred in Chicago Fire as Donna Robbins. Melissa_Ponzio ( born August_3_,_1972 ) is an_American_actress , best_known for her_roles as Melissa_McCall on Teen_Wolf and Karen on The_Walking_Dead . Most_recently , Ponzio has_starred in Chicago_Fire as Donna_Robbins .
